edu.vccs.vdh275.banking

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.vccs.vdh275.banking.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Use this class to simulate a bank account
    with withdraw, deposit, and inquiry methods
    Author:
    Vanessa Harris
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
